Name: Limnology
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A vodka Gimlet made with lime flavoured vodka.
History: Created by yours truly in 2002, this cocktail is named after the study of the physical phenomena of lakes and other fresh waters-appropriate as it was originally based on Finlandia vodka, which is made using spring water so pure that it needs no purification.
Nutrition: One serving of Limnology contains 51 calories
